column8: Now baru first day of january sudah kacau me bayar bill. Bill kata last day is 15 january!. I know when to pay my bills and just tell me once. Today few times sms + email me tell me to bayar your bill.I so angry u not yet give me your promised upgraded speed in 2017 and u still dare disturb me to pay your bills?? Ayam talking about unifi bills
meibe ur records no good?    next time, auto-debit jer lah, got discount RM2 sumore
umno got ask ppl to pay bills?
I tak pernah late bayar them. Since day 1 of their service i never late. I tak nak auto because later they secretly overcharge me
They do it in another way.

Then maybe u consider high risk in their credit records   Go check nama ada masuk CTOS, CCRIS or not? PTPN ada hutang tak bayar or not?   Now, everything link, u hutang one, u hutang all, nama buruk everywhere   Tak mau auto, then, don't rage lor they call.....me auto debit jer, no issue at all....
boikot tmnet! jk.. im stil using..
Bangang pakai but don't want to payI just paid Maxis, Unifi and TNB earlier
